attachments.title: La Roux – “Tropical Chancer”
attachments.text: Fresh off taking the stage at Governor's Ball this past weekend, La Roux has released another track off her upcoming Trouble in Paradise album. "Tropical Chancer" is the third song we've heard off of Paradise after ""Uptight Downtown" and "Let Me Down Gently." "Chancer" is an island-tinged dance track, complete with steel drums and a bouncy guitar riff that takes a page out of Daft Punk's "Get Lucky." It's also replete with the disco influences
